Key Match Events: Benin Republic came from behind to defeat Libya 2-1 in the second match of Group D’s MatchDay 2 contest in Abidjan.
Libya’s Faisal Saleh converted a 9th minute penalty kick.
Steve Mounie scored a rifling shot to restore parity for Benin Republic five minutes into the second half.
Junior Olaitan converted a penalty kick to secure the win for Benin Republic.
